result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lavonne P. Linklater

defendant.name: Linklater, Lavonne P.
defendant.address: 154 Old Abe Road; P.O. Box 657, Lac du Flambeau, WI 54538

records.addlTxt: Not to possess, use, or ingest illegal drugs, Maintain absolute sobriety, Not to possess or consume intoxicants, No taverns or to be in the tavern portion of any restaurant premises. Crefuew 7PM to 7AM 7 days per week, provide address where staying, with written permission of home owner prior to release.

1:03 PM Defendant Lavonne P. Linklater in court, in custody Vilas County Jail without counsel awaiting public defender.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Court address letter submitted by defendant to modify bond was submitted to wrong case should have been submitted in case 22CF164. State gives argument on bond. Court address bond and modifies bond to $200.00 cash with conditions Not to possess, use, or ingest illegal drugs,Maintain absolute sobriety, Not to possess or consume intoxicants, No taverns or to be in the tavern portion of any restaurant premises. Crefuew 7PM to 7AM 7 days per week, provide address where staying, with written permission of home owner prior to release.
Status hearing scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Maintain absolute sobriety, Not to possess or consume intoxicants, No taverns or to be in the tavern portion of any restaurant premises. Not to possess, use, or ingest illegal drugs. Curfew from 7:00 PM to 7:00 AM 7 days a week, no abusive with law enforcement.

2:34 PM Defendant Lavonne P. Linklater appeared by video, in custody from the Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Victim rights complied with. No victim appearing. Court reads charges. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint. Attorney rights given. State speaks to bond. Court issues $1,000.00 CASH with conditions: Maintain absolute sobriety, Not to possess or consume intoxicants, No taverns or to be in the tavern portion of any restaurant premises. Not to possess, use, or ingest illegal drugs, Curfew from 7:00 PM to 7:00 AM 7 days a week, no abusive with law enforcement.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Lavonne P. Linklater
Current: 154 Old Abe Road; P.O. Box 657, Lac du Flambeau, WI 54538   (Effective: 10-21-2022)
Prior: 150 Old Abe Road P.O. Box 1243, Lac du Flambeau, WI 54538
